name: brxp
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wb(wbr(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, c2)))

stmt.origin: bitri(wbr(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(cop(c0, c3), cxp(c1, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, c2)))
-| wb(wbr(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3), wcel(cop(c0, c3), cxp(c1, c2)))
-| wb(wcel(cop(c0, c3), cxp(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, c2)))
-| wb(wbr(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3), wcel(cop(c0, c3), cxp(c1, c2)))
-| wb(wcel(cop(c0, c3), cxp(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, c2)))

body.origin: |- wb(wbr(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3), wcel(cop(c0, c3), cxp(c1, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, c2)))
-| wb(wcel(cop(c0, c3), cxp(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, c2)))

body.origin: |- wb(wcel(cop(c0, c3), cxp(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, c2)))

cumulated.origin: |- wb(wbr(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, c2)))

comment: Binary relation on a Cartesian product. (Contributed by NM, 22-Apr-2004.)
